task: Attached is an annotated mouse brain AnnData object with cell type annotations stored in `adata.obs['predicted_cell_type']`. For the cell type classified as 'Oligodendrocyte', perform a 1-vs-all Wilcoxon differential expression test against all other cell types. Sort genes by log fold change (descending), then Wilcoxon score (descending), filter for adjusted p-value < 0.05, and report the Top-20 ranked genes for the 'Oligodendrocyte' population. Return a JSON object with field: top_marker_genes (list of exactly 20 gene names in ranked order).

scoring.set_definition: Compare the agent's Top-20 predicted oligodendrocyte marker genes to the canonical set
scoring.description: Passes only if both Precision@20 ≥ 0.60 and Recall@20 ≥ 0.50.
